description: This Thai beef salad with rice noodles is ready in 15 minutes and just two steps. An ideal option for midweek lunch or dinner.
keywords: 15-Minute Thai Beef Salad With Rice Noodles
name: 15-Minute Thai Beef Salad With Rice Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place salad from kits in noodle bowl. Shred beef and add to salad with tomato, cucumber and 3/4 of coriander. Add dressing from salad kit and toss until combined. Serve sprinkled with crispy shallots from kit and remaining coriander.

Place salad from kits in noodle bowl. Shred beef and add to salad with tomato, cucumber and 3/4 of coriander. Add dressing from salad kit and toss until combined. Serve sprinkled with crispy shallots from kit and remaining coriander.
